events.question: Hi! My name is Eyeleen Everwater! I saw the ad about the apartment for rent and wanted to apply!

events.choice: ASK why she wants to rent

events.text: So… we have many options for different monsters, of all kinds! What are you looking for?
Well since I have 3 kids, I need something pretty spacious. Maybe 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a kitchen. Actually, just give me your cheapest option. It really can’t be too expensive.
